column1: DESCRIPTION
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Success is not an overnight achievement; it's the result of consistent effort.
The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement.
The key to success is consistency. And right now, I'm consistently running late and procrastinating.
Motivation gets you going, but habit gets you there.
Consistency is the key to success. Without consistency, you'll never finish.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
Your habits will determine your future.
The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
Success is a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it's inspiring.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Good habits are as addictive as bad habits, and a lot more rewarding.
Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying basic fundamentals.
It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
Your beliefs become your thoughts, your thoughts become your words, your words become your actions, your actions become your habits, your habits become your values, your values become your destiny.
Success is not a destination, it's a journey.
The more you do something, the better you get at it. Keep going.
Success is a habit, not an event.
Be stubborn about your goals, but flexible about your methods.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
The only way to do great work is to be consistently motivated.
The secret of success is consistency of purpose.
The most powerful force in the universe is compound interest.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
The more consistent you are, the more successful you become.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
You can't change your life until you change your daily habits.
Consistency is the foundation of success.
